column1: text
What a thrilling match! Rahul's magnificent century led Punjab Kings to victory over Delhi Capitals.
Superb performance by Dhoni as he steers Chennai Super Kings to a win against Sunrisers Hyderabad.
Incredible bowling display by Bumrah helps Mumbai Indians defend a low total against Rajasthan Royals.
Great partnership between Kohli and de Villiers sets up a huge total for Royal Challengers Bangalore against Kolkata Knight Riders.
Russell's explosive batting takes KKR to victory over RR in a nail-biting finish.
Bravo's stunning catch secured victory for CSK against MI. What a game!
Kuldeep Yadav's magical spell helps Kolkata Knight Riders restrict SRH to a low score.
